name: coverage-blamer
description: coverage-blamer is tool for get information about authors of uncovered code

scripts.prepublish: npm run snyk-protect; coffee -o lib -c src
scripts.test-coverage: ./node_modules/coffee-coverage/bin/coffeecoverage --path relative src .tmp & COVERAGE=true ./node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha --compilers coffee:coffee-script/register -R json-cov $(find test -name '*.coffee') > coverage/coverage.json
scripts.ci: ./node_modules/coffee-coverage/bin/coffeecoverage --path relative src .tmp & COVERAGE=true ./node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha --compilers coffee:coffee-script/register -R mocha-phantom-coverage-reporter $(find test -name '*.coffee')

author: Andrey Kucherenko
